mapper.select: select images01 from t_images where product_code = #{product_code}
select product_code from t_product where product_type = #{product_type} order by product_code DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_product(product_code, product_type, product_color, product_size, product_name, product_price, product_date, star_sum, star_avg) values (#{product_code}, #{product_type}, #{product_color}, #{product_size}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, now(), 0, 0)
insert into t_images(product_code, images01, images02, images03, images04) values (#{product_code}, #{images01}, #{images02}, #{images03}, #{images04})
